TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FormViewDeletedEventHandler(object sender, FormViewDeletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FormViewDeletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FormViewDeletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FormViewDeletedEventArgs)
public delegate void FormViewDeletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FormViewDeletedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controla el evento de un control .

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El controlar genera el eventos cuando un botón Eliminar (un botón con su `CommandName` propiedad establecida en "Delete") dentro del control se hace clic, pero después el control elimina el registro.The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. Esto le permite proporcionar un método de control de eventos que realiza una rutina personalizada, como comprobar los resultados de una operación de eliminación, siempre que se produce este evento.This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante programación un delegar a la eventos de un control.The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventHandler2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventHandler2/CS/formviewdeletedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventHandler2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventHandler2/VB/formviewdeletedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante declaración un delegar a la eventos de un control.The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventHandlerDeclarative2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventHandlerDeclarative2/CS/formviewdeletedeventhandlerdeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventHandlerDeclarative2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventHandlerDeclarative2/VB/formviewdeletedeventhandlerdeclarativevb.aspx#1)]
